page.title: 19The New School in Haddenham
page.content: {St. Mary's First School}was built in {1981}and is very different from the old school. The new school has 4 classrooms. It has an office for the Head Teacher and another office for Mrs Brown who is the secretary and welfare assistant. There are lots of pictures on the walls and the children have nice books to read and nice paper to write on. There is a{large hall}with PE equipment and a kitchen where the cooks make dinner. The children do different subjects each month and lots of other things as well, like{Sports Day}and{Domesday {surveys. Our Mums and Dads went to the old school, but we are much luckier.
